hot potato.name: Hot Potato
hot potato.desc: Gain a large boost of speed after throwing a bomb. Your bombs have a chance to detonate twice.

sulphur surprise.name: Sulphur Surprise
sulphur surprise.desc: Your cooldown for throwing bombs will be shortened after your first bomb damages on enemy.

pocket bombs.name: Pocket Bombs
pocket bombs.desc: You have a chance to activate a bomb in your inventory when damaged.

incendiary formula.name: Incendiary Formula
incendiary formula.desc: Bombs will set your enemies on fire upon detonation, as well as launch with more force. Bombs will deal 20% increased damage to burning enemies.

family recipe.name: Family Recipe
family recipe.desc: You can now craft bombs at a crafting bench.

explosive efficiency.name: Explosive Efficiency
explosive efficiency.desc: When crafting bombs, you craft double the amount. You have the chance to triple the amount.
